content.p3: Thanks to everyone who showed up and asked questions, I had fun setting this up and attempting to install a new plugin called the “Gonzales plugin” that sped up the site! (Sorry for the cut out in audio at the end, I’ll work on that.)

content2.p: I’ll be doing this every Friday starting next week (unless no one shows up). You can watch last week’s episode below, then send in your own question for the next show. The next show will be on
